purpose: To outline the necessary actions and considerations regarding risk tolerance.
title: Risk Appetite

bullets.text: Determine if they have a low, medium, or high risk tolerance
Convey established tolerance and loss goals to all stakeholders and across all impacted lines of business
Measure effectiveness of performance against established risk tolerance
Revisit risk appetite question regularly and adjust if applicable
Fraud will never be eliminated, but it can be controlled
Are we more of a risk focused or customer focused organization?
Are we willing to impact one or more (Risk, Profit, Customer Satisfaction) to control the other?
Is the appropriate support in place within the organization to meet the objective?
What level of investment are we willing to make to reach that objective?

reasoning_strategy: Listing key actions and considerations for risk management.
